demos.name: Filter Design HDL Coder
demos.description: The Filter Design HDL Coder will accelerate the development of ASIC and FPGA designs and bridge the gap between system-level design and hardware development by providing tools that generate hardware description language (HDL) code. This product will enable designers to quickly and accurately transform a high-level abstract filter description (quantized filter object) into a device-independent VHDL or Verilog filter implementation that can be synthesized.
